attributes.action: bring forward the date for the freebee swimming for us pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Us pensioners(while grateful for the free bus passes) can only travel so far so many times then it gets monotonous. Cant you bring forward that freebee swimming thing so that we can travel and have a bit of exercise at the pool as well?.THe Prince Regent, Brighton has a nice sauna and steam room but its private.come on man, if you gonna give something give it or dont bother.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
